item.title: function_name
item.description: Explain briefly what the recipe does. Explain briefly how the recipe works. Provide a citation and link to documentation of any third party software. Provide the version of the software/package Use bullet points for your recipe's explanation. Try to explain everything briefly but clearly. 1 2 3 def function_name(args): # code return 0 1 function_name(val) # result
